New Records: Nitish Reddy scored the second-highest T20 total against Bangladesh, with 74 runs off 26 balls
Key Match Events: Nitish Reddy and Rinku Singh put on 108 runs off just 49 balls
India scored 120 runs in the final 10 overs
Bangladesh was restricted to 135-9 in 20 overs
Post-Match Reflections: Nitish Reddy was named player of the match for his all-round performance
Reddy said he feels great to represent India and it is a proud moment for him
Miscellaneous Highlights: India sealed the series 2-0 with a 86-run win over Bangladesh
The third and final T20 will be played in Hyderabad on Saturday
Others: Seven Indian bowlers picked up wickets
